thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 288 2
thread.title: McCooterbob Cartwright
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 McCooterbob Cartwright

author: McCooterbob Cartwright
title: McCooterbob Cartwright
text: I ordered a camera from Banggood and it was not functioning properly when it arrived. After some discussion with customer service, a full refund was credited to the credit card used for the purchase. I am not saying they do this all the time, but it is good to know the lengths they will go to in order to ensure a customer is satisfied in the end.
